projects.name: Medicines Complete
projects.description: Medicines Complete is a comprehensive online platform offering access to a curated collection of world-leading pharmaceutical resources. It provides healthcare professionals with easily searchable, trusted, and evidence-based drug information. The primary purpose is to support informed decision-making regarding medication use. Ultimately, it aims to ensure the safe and effective application of medicines by providing reliable knowledge at the point of care.

projects.name: Dashboard App
projects.description: Developed a central Dashboard Application leveraging ReactJS, Vite, and Tailwind CSS to showcase a diverse portfolio of projects. It aggregates applications like Multimedia, Blog Posts, Image Identification, and a CV Builder into one accessible hub. Each entry concisely details the project's unique features, tech stack, and provides direct links to both live demos and GitHub repositories for easy exploration.

projects.name: Derivco Slot Games
projects.description: Developed engaging, high-performance slot games for Derivco, a leading global provider of premium online gaming software, using JavaScript, HTML5 Canvas, sprite images, and CSS. Proactively incorporated modern ES6 concepts to enhance code efficiency and maintainability. Collaborated effectively with cross-functional design and requirements teams throughout the development lifecycle. Provided crucial production support for deployed games, ensuring stability and optimal player experience for Derivco's partners.
